lu.uni.distributedsystems.gsonrmi.server

Enum ServiceMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ServiceMode>
      • lu.uni.distributedsystems.gsonrmi.server.ServiceMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ServiceMode>

    public enum ServiceMode
extends java.lang.Enum<ServiceMode>
    Enumeration of the modes in which JSON-RPC requests shall be processed.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DISCONNECT_BEFORE_PROCESSING
      Close the connection before handling the request in any way.
      DISCONNECT_BEFORE_REPLY
      Close the connection after having processed the request, but before sending back the response.
      RANDOM
      The service mode will be determined randomly for every subsequent request.
      RELIABLE
      Process requests in a reliable way, i.e.

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • RELIABLE

        public static final ServiceMode RELIABLE
        Process requests in a reliable way, i.e. without disconnections, interruptions, crashes, or alike.

      • DISCONNECT_BEFORE_PROCESSING

        public static final ServiceMode DISCONNECT_BEFORE_PROCESSING
        Close the connection before handling the request in any way. Please note that no interceptor will be called in this mode.

      • DISCONNECT_BEFORE_REPLY

        public static final ServiceMode DISCONNECT_BEFORE_REPLY
        Close the connection after having processed the request, but before sending back the response. Please note that in this mode, the interceptor will be called for both the request as well as the response.

      • RANDOM

        public static final ServiceMode RANDOM
        The service mode will be determined randomly for every subsequent request. This includes all three other modes, i.e. RELIABLE, DISCONNECT_BEFORE_PROCESSING, and DISCONNECT_BEFORE_REPLY. Please note that by definition of the two latter modes, the connection will be closed in those cases. If the randomly selected service mode is RELIABLE, however, the next request will be handled in a reliable fashion, keeping the connection alive. For each subsequent request, a service mode will again be chosen randomly.

    • Method Detail

      • values

        public static ServiceMode[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (ServiceMode c : ServiceMode.values())
    System.out.println(c);

        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared
